name: places/ChIJJ0fRQwhZwokR156qC8g0swo
formattedAddress: 200 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 200 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I’ve been coming to this salon for over a year now specifically for Albert! He always does a great, thorough job trimming my hair & even gives me styling tips / recommendations. He is super experienced & very knowledgeable about haircare. My appointments are always on time too. The other gentlemen in the salon are also always pleasant & sweet every time I come in. Love this place & shout out Albert!!!

text.text: I’ve been coming to this salon for over a year now specifically for Albert! He always does a great, thorough job trimming my hair & even gives me styling tips / recommendations. He is super experienced & very knowledgeable about haircare. My appointments are always on time too. The other gentlemen in the salon are also always pleasant & sweet every time I come in. Love this place & shout out Albert!!!

originalText.text: This salon is a hidden gem! I have been going to Albert to get my hair cut for about a year, and every time I go in, I know I’m in good hands. I usually have no idea how to describe what I’m looking for, but Albert just gets hair and can interpret what looks best based on my hair type. He’s definitely a master at his craft (as well as a really nice guy!). The prices are also extremely reasonable for such a wonderful studio and quality haircut in a super convenient location. 1000/10 would recommend.

text.text: This salon is a hidden gem! I have been going to Albert to get my hair cut for about a year, and every time I go in, I know I’m in good hands. originalText.text:
Worst experience with Albert. I came in for a haircut expecting long layers and only 1-2  inches off my curly, long hair. I showed some reference pictures too — all long hair pics.
You can see my attached photos.

He barely looked at the photos, didn’t ask me any questions and quickly cut off 6-8 inches. He would’ve kept going if I didn’t make a big deal out of it and ask him to stop. Now i’m left with shoulder length hair that looks even shorter since my hair is curly. Also there are no long layers anymore due to the short length of the hair, which is not suited for curly hair. He tried to cut some strange layers which makes the hair stick out above the shoulders giving it a triangular shape instead of volume at the top (see my attached photo). I need to get a new haircut to correct this botched job which will make my length even shorter. Poor example of not listening or respecting the customers needs. Ruined both my length and my haircut!!

Instead of apologizing or offering a refund, the stylist and his coworkers then tried to gaslight me saying this is the length he showed with his fingers. It was not. Also he said it’ll take a few days to getting used to — no, it’ll take a few years for it to grow back. The nerve.

I’m sorry I came here, and immensely regret my experience. 2 years of growing my hair out, all gone in 20 mins because I stepped foot into the wrong salon. I will not be coming back. Please avoid or you’ll be left in tears like me.

originalText.text: Albert is an incredible hair stylist. I wasn’t sure how to describe how I wanted my hair to turn out and provided minimal instructions but Albert knew just how to cut my hair to produce gorgeous results. I’m in love with my new hair and a lot of my friends are using it as their reference photos for future haircuts. I will definitely be using Albert in the future and the price is also very fair!!

text.text: Albert is an incredible hair stylist. I wasn’t sure how to describe how I wanted my hair to turn out and provided minimal instructions but Albert knew just how to cut my hair to produce gorgeous results. I’m in love with my new hair and a lot of my friends are using it as their reference photos for future haircuts. I will definitely be using Albert in the future and the price is also very fair!!

originalText.text:
(Albert)
I've been a client of Albert for the past 2.5 years, since March 2021, and I can confidently say that he's one of the best hair stylists I've been to. I've had my fair share of poor haircuts in the past, and I completely trust him to listen to me and make me feel confident. I don't visit the salon too often, maybe two or three times a year, but my hair always looks and feels healthy for months after. Thanks Albert!

text.text:
(Albert)
